text: My husband and I decided to stay at Villa Seriska Satu for our honeymoon in Bali, and what a great decision it was! From start to finish, the service really was impeccable. They contacted us before our stay to ask if we needed transportation from the airport to the hotel. We were able to use WhatsApp to communicate with them, and they were extremely responsive. Once we arrived at the villas, we were greeted by Made and Putu with a nice cold drink and cold towels. Made explained rules/how things work, gave us some books that included tours, in room massages, and meals that we can book with the villa. (We booked an aromatherapy warm oil massage & definitely recommend booking one!). The Villa staff are so friendly, respectful, fun, and accommodating! Made was so helpful with any questions that we had and was very good with recommendations. I cannot express how awesome Made, Putu, and Komang are! They’re really great people and made our stay extra special! Every morning, we got a delicious home cooked meal (cooked in the Villa). The Nasi Goreng is so delicious and the juice and fruit were so refreshing! As far as the actual Villa goes, it exceeded our expectations! It’s beautiful and clean (the staff made sure to keep it that way every day). The feel of the Villa was exactly what we were looking for; tropical, romantic, clean, & overall, just gorgeous. I would recommend Villa Serjska to anyone staying in Seminyak, and would definitely book with them again!
title: Amazing staff! Beautiful Villa!!!

owner_response.text:
Thank you for staying with us! We are very grateful for your detailed review of your stay at Villa Seriska, Bali :) 

We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our villa and service. We look forward to welcoming you back to our villa :)

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The vila was beautiful, when we arrived the staff were happy to help with everything. They bought us cold towels and welcoming drinks as they gave us a run down of the Villa. The villa has 3 bedrooms all with air conditioning, the staff prepared breakfast each morning (which was great- try the banana pancakes) and the private pool adds extra luxuary to the already beautiful villa.
title: LOVED IT!!!

owner_response.text:
Thank you for staying with us :) We are so happy to hear that you LOVED our villa and service! We look forward to welcoming you and your family/friends back to one of our villas in Bali.

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We visited Villa Seriska at the end of our 4-week-holiday in Bali and we all loved it! We were looking for comfortable accommodation that is easy with kids (got a 3yo daughter and a 4 month old son), so if our two monkeys need some rest we can simply stay in and enjoy the island life from a Bali house. And we found exactly that :) Villa Seriska is a very cozy place, well thought through in terms of what can be helpful to use for their guests. Swimming pool was nicely placed and with a bit of shallow space which was great for our daughter to play. The staff was taking great care of us, by helping with bookings and any questions we had. Breakfast was very tasty and with enough choices for all of us (our daughter is quite difficult with food these days). And they got some good system for against mosquitos here cause even though there were mosquitos here of course, we didn’t struggled as much as in the previous places (our daughter gets a strong allergic reaction to bites so it was a relief..). The place is also 5 min walking distance from many food places and shopping street, so easy to get around during the day.
All in all, we would be happy to come back again.
title: Lovely Bali villa in the heart of Seminyak

owner_response.text:
Thank you for staying with us! We are so happy to hear that you found our villa and service to be lovely. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to one of our villas in Bali :)

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed 8 nights at Villa Seriska Dua and loved every minute of it. We loved the layout and the way the living room spilled into the patio and garden coming from outside into the kitchen. The villa provided a variety of services including breakfast cooked to order every morning, standard room service, laundry service, bottled water, and mosquito/bug treatment every night. We also paid for other additional services such as daily tours across the island. The villa took care of all of the arrangements and made every day worry free and didn't have to worry about the bill until the end of our stay. We also took advantage of massage treatments and dinner service provided by the villa. As far as the surrounding area, the villa is tucked away in a nice quiet part of Seminyak with many great places to eat and shop. I can't say anything bad about this place. I highly recommend you book this place for your stay in Bali. Special thanks to Villa Supervisor-Made, our driver Thomas, and the rest of the staff for making this such a wonderful honeymoon for us!
title: Unforgettable Honeymoon!

owner_response.text:
Thank you for staying with us:) 

We are so happy that we played a part in making your "Unforgettable Honeymoon". Our aim is to make sure that our guests have the best possible experience of our island and we are there to handle everything to make this happen. We hope to welcome you back some day soon!

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Our stay here was amazing the staff were so friendly and helpful especially Made! :) They always cleaned our villa perfectly and made us the best breakfast in the morning as well as closing all the windows and doors for us at night so mosquitoes don’t get in! Lovely place 100% recommend! Also best shower ever! The whole villa is so private and quiet, which is lovely to have in such a busy area :)
title: Amazing clean beautiful private villa

owner_response.text:
Thank you for staying at our private pool villa in Seminyak, Bali - Villa Seriska Seminyak. We are so glad to hear that you found our villa and staff amazing and you would recommend our villa 100% ! We look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon :)

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
An incredible peaceful retreat in Seminyak. We came on our honeymoon and it was the perfect way to start the trip. The staff were sensational - no ask was too big or too small. We had a romantic dinner by the pool (cooked for us - we arrived late from a day trip and everything was set up when we got home,), two day trips and three massages which we had by our pool! Bliss. Breakfast was filling and delicious - the smoothie bowl was so tasty. The room and bathroom were beautiful - the bathroom was half outside and felt very tropical - hot showers too (not that you need a hot shower in 30 degrees!)

The private pool was great to have, and we also had a little lounge area and second bathroom. Plenty for two people! 

Thank you to everyone who made our stay so fantastic! 

Worth every penny and would love to try some of their villas in other cities. 

 Seminyak is quite touristy but couldn’t hear a thing from our room. Apparently all the villas were booked but we wouldn’t have known. You can walk to the beach in 20 mins to just get a cheap scooter taxi (don’t get an actual taxi - not worth it in the traffic!)
title: Incredible from start to finish!

text:
Upon arrival Tomas the driver met us at the airport and was full of helpful information. We arrived around 9am and expected a 2pm checkin but upon arrival Putra, the villa manager, explained the staff were busy cleaning the villa immediately after previous guests left so we didn’t have to wait long. A great start to our stay. 

Putra was very helpful and explained not only about the villa but seminyak and a range of tours, driven by Tomas, which were amazingly cheap. More on those later. We also met Made and Komang who were housekeepers and very friendly. 

We stayed in villa seriska dua in seminyak which is a fantastic one bedroom villa, very spacious, well furnished and excellent in every way. 

Next morning two people turned up at our requested time to make us breakfast. I have stayed in many hotels around the world and never had such wonderful personal service. This was repeated every morning of our stay. 

The trips we took with Tomas were great. He’s a jolly guy and made sure we went where we wanted to, adjusting  the trips to suit us rather than following a fixed itinerary. 

We totally enjoyed our stay and I would recommend it to everyone.
title: First class in all ways

owner_response.text:
Thank you for staying at Villa Seriska, Bali. We are all so happy to hear that you enjoyed our villa and personalised service: "I have stayed in many hotels around the world and never had such wonderful personal service." :)

We hope to welcome you back to our villa some day soon.

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
First time in Bali, chose to stay at the Seriska Villa in Seminyak would definetely recommend to couples and families who are looking for a relaxing private villa with amazing accommodation and staff. Not much more you can ask for here! 
Made and Yuni were the most helpful and welcoming staff you could ask for, very honest with amazing breakfast every morning
title: Holiday

text:
We spent 2 nights here at the one-bedroom villa, it is one-bedroom but there is an extra 2 units sofa bed, so it allows 2 additional persons sleep at the sofabed.
The Villa is at the end of a lane so it is extraordinarily quiet, but as soon as we walked out of the lane, there are restaurants and shops  everywhere, and the main street is just within five minutes walk.
We can always feel how attentively the villa team is. We were given a cell phone to call the villa staffs when necessary.  They also have thoughtful Hygiene and anti-mosquito measures that we didn't even bitten by mosquito.  The villa supervisor, MADE, come to cook breakfast for us every morning. He is very careful and friendly, he can help arrange all kind of activity and local tour in Bali if needed. We really love here and everything in Villa Seriska left perfect memory to our trip at Bali.
title: Excellent Bali, Excellent Villa

owner_response.text:
Dear Carol,

We loved having you and your family stay with us :) Thank you for your wonderful comments about our villa and service. We are glad to hear that Villa Seriska "left perfect memory" of your trip to Bali. We hope to welcome you and your family back to one of our villas soon!

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We fall in love with this place. Villa seriska took our breath away from the first moment to the end of our stay. We didn't want to leave this place even to see surrounding area or going out for a meal. For two days we stayed here just enjoying our time by the pool. We felt so special being treating with a lovely breakfast made every morning in our kitchen by Made, who looked after us for whole stay. Thank you Made. We also really loved dinner made by fantastic people Komang and Sila. Thank you all for making us feeling welcome and cosy in this beautiful villa.
title: Best villa in Bali

owner_response.text:
Thank you for your fabulous review of our villa and staff. It was a pleasure having you stay with us and we are all happy when we hear that our guests loved their stay with us! We hope to welcome you back to our villa some day soon :)

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Just returned and I can’t fault the villa, clean and modern with a great location, close to town but also off the main drag so you don’t get the Bali toot toot from every scooter and taxi. From the owner to all the staff thank you for a fab vacation, nothing was too much trouble, so helpful and easy going very refreshing.  
Your flexibility on our last day was so well received thanks again, when we return to Bali we know where we will be staying
title: Fantastic Break great villa and staff

owner_response.text:
Dear Gary,

It was a pleasure having you and your family stay at our 3 bedroom, private pool villa in Seminyak, Bali. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to one of our villas soon :)

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Stayed for a week and couldn't fault the villa or staff.  Located at the end of a no through road making the location quiet yet close to the beach, shops and restaurants.  All our needs were taken care of by the attentive staff from airport pickup, tours, poolside yoga, breakfast, massages and booking taxis for us.  We were given a mobile phone to call the manager if need be which gave us peace of mind.  Our requests were always met promptly and with courtesy.  The villa was spotless and spacious.
title: Quite and relaxing

owner_response.text:
Dear Karen,

It was lovely to have you and your husband stay with us at our Seminyak villa in Bali. We are glad that you "could't fault" our villa or service. I have shown your comments to our team and everybody is happy to see your nice comments. I hope we can welcome you and your family back to our villa someday soon :)

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed in the one bedroom villa for 2 weeks In June and it was more than we could have hoped for. From the moment we arrived we were made to feel at home, nothing was ever too much trouble and all the staff work hard to make sure that the villa is kept to a very high standard. There is a private pool which is lovely especially at night when it is all lit up! We were cooked breakfast every morning which was always very nice. The villa offers a private car service to take you wherever you wish to go which we used to create our own little tour of the Ubud area. The villa is close to the more upmarket part of Seminyak with a large selection of boutiques and restaurants within a short walk, we would recommend Rolling Fork for fresh pasta, Warung Italia for pizza and Bo & Bun for a mix of Vietnamese/Balinese street food. The beach is about a 20 minute walk away but taxis are always available. We were sad to leave but would definitely come back if we ever visit Bali again and will be recommending these villas to friends and family. Thank you to all the staff for making our stay pleasant and memorable 😊
title: Amazing

owner_response.text:
We are so glad to hear that you have an "amazing" holiday with us and our villa & service exceeded your expectation :) We hope to welcome you back to Bali and one of our villas in the future.

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Beautiful villa in the heart of Seminyak.  Super friendly and attentive staff.  Always available to assist us with anything we needed.  Putra and his team organized tours for us and were very flexible with our schedule.  We felt very comfortable during the five night stay.  The villa is very centrally located to shops, restaurants and the beach.  Highly recommend.
title: Wonderful villa managed by a fantastic team.

text:
We stayed here as an extended family (8ppl) spanning in ages teens to grandparents in their 80’s. Having everything (bedroom, pool, lounge) on the ground floor made it perfect for my parents with enough accommodation for others upstairs.

From arrival to departure we were beautifully looked after with cooked breakfasts, NY dinner in-house (which was amazing) Thomas drove us to so many amazing places and went out of his way to assist my mother (staying with her when places were a little to far for her to walk too).

The Villa is clean and well cared for with a fabulous pool located down a quiet laneway so no road or city noise but still easy walk distance to restaurants etc. 

Can’t wait to return and stay in the Sanur villa’s  (which were booked out) 

Again huge thank you to all the amazing staff which made our first full family holiday perfect !! 

Rick & Caro 
Australia
title: Wonderful & Relaxing Villa

text:
Villa Seriska Seminyak, Bali:
Excellent, very comfortable villa and private pool, with polite and attentive staff, who prepare delicious breakfasts and other meals if pre-ordered, close to restaurants and shops.  The only drawback was the occasional cutting and drilling noises from the nearby building developments.
title: Excellent Villa, Pool and Service

text: Initially I though the villa was a bit far out, turns out it was in another pocket of seminyak I had not found in my previous visits. I would now say the villa is in a great position. Near lots of great restaurants and bars and some of the best shopping in Bali. What really makes this villa is the great service from Made and the team. I can highly recommend. Thanks for a great stay. And according to my family the best pancakes yet.
title: Lovely villa

text:
Villa Seriska
I was searching for my first holidays after covid and my honeymoon too. Wanted a comfortable, luxury place with utmost privacy. Villa Seriska is the property which got my attention immediately. I kept searching for other options but none was able to impress and I booked Villa Seriska immediately.

My Experience :- right from the date of booking, Putra, the manager, started to assist me with all my requests (planned a small surprise for my wife). Made, assistant manager, is very warm and very helpful. Villa is beautiful, spacious and gives you all the privacy you need for your holiday. Both Putra and Made are very accommodating to our requests. Breakfast will be cooked at the villa at your preferred time. Located in Seminyak, nearby to pubs, clubs, lot of food options nearby, minimart right outside villa etc. are some key highlights.
Overall, highly recommended place to stay if you are visiting Bali.
title: Amazing villa with great hospitality !!

text: So well welcomed. Can not speak highly enough. Lovely place to hide away and recoup. Relaxing. Clean. They bent over backwards to accommodate. Breakfast cooked for us in our villa every morning. Truly spoilt.
title: Fabulous place and staff

owner_response.text:
Thank you for staying with us! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and felt "truly spoilt":)

We hope to welcome you and your family back to Villa Seriska, Bali someday soon.

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Our stay there was very nice. Admirable hospitality, great food, very clean place and had a great time. Love to visit again . Having a great private pool, spacious room and living area as well as high security in the night time.
title: Villa Seriska Seminyak

owner_response.text:
Thank you for staying with us and we are so happy to hear that you had a great time staying at our private pool villa in Seminyak, Bali. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back some day soon!

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Beautiful private villa and true to the pictures provided! Enjoyed the 4-night stay here very much. 

Villa Seriska Seminyak is made up of two villas - a 3 bedroom one and another 1 (or 2?) bedroom one. 

Villa came with a butler and attendants to make up the room when needed during the day, and at night, a security guard is on patrol at the main entrance of the villa compound. 

The villa manager, Putra will be ready to help for any questions you may have during your stay. A phone is provided for you to contact Putra for any help you may need. Made was our butler and also prepared our breakfast - he was amazing (thank you Made!) 

Breakfast choices were wide and we tried almost all on the menu.... all good! 

You can arrange for a airport/port transfer to/from the villa at around (230-290k was the price for sanur port to the villa for 6 people) 

Well located and within walking distance to the main area in Seminyak. There’s 2 minimarts right outside the main road and many other eateries too.
title: Beautiful villa, amazing hospitality, good location

owner_response.text:
Thank you for your amazing comments about our villa and service ! 

We are so happy to hear that your enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you & your friends back to one of our villas in Bali :)

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
My partner and I stayed here for 2 nights and are disappointed that we didn’t manage to book another night as planned as it was exactly what we wanted for our Bali holiday. 
The place was extremely spacious and clean for the two of us ( meant for 6 people) and great value for money. There is great attention to detail and had everything you needed. It is peaceful here yet close by to shops. Finally, we couldn’t be more grateful for the hospitality that was given by our host and staff. They were so friendly, helpful and provided exceptional service which made this Bali trip memorable.
title: MAGNIFICENT VILLA & EXCEPTIONAL SERVICE

text: My partner and I stayed here for 10 nights towards the end of May. We stayed in the one bedroom villa in Seminyak. The villa has it's own pool and is away from the road. This makes it a beautifully peaceful retreat perfect for relaxing at. Shops and restaurants are only a short taxi ride or walk away, they are very easy to get to. We arranged through the Villa Manager a few day  trips, one including a trip to Ubud for the day (which was amazing), and the other ATV riding along the beach and through rice terraces (also amazing). We were also able to make use of the villa's private driver to get to more remote locations, the driver was so friendly. The villa staff that we saw morning and night were also so friendly and ensured the villa was always so clean. We had an awesome trip. We will definitely be back and will be recommending Villa Seriska to family and friends. This Villa is 5 stars.
title: Amazing Stay

owner_response.text:
Thank you for your nice comments about your stay at our one bedroom, private pool villa in Seminyak, Bali. We are so glad that you found our service and villa as the "perfect retreat" in the heart of Seminyak. Thank you for recommending our villas to your friends and family and we hope to welcome you back some day soon :)

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Stayed for 3 nights and the experience was really good. We were greeted by the manager at the airport, and the services and support were great. Staff would come to your kitchen and cook you breakfast, and you can have your spa at poolside. The bedrooms are very comfy and it got a nice private pool. Downtown was just 10min walk from the villa, it’s convenient while offering a quiet environment. Would definitely recommend to someone who are looking for a quiet and decent place to relax.
title: Great villa experience

owner_response.text:

We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and were happy with our villa and service. Thank you for recommending our villa to your friends and we hope that you will come back to Bali soon and stay with us again.

The Villa Seriska Team

text: Stayed here for three nights in the three bedroom, two bathroom villa with friends We were greeted by the owner with friendly and accommodating staff. Our villa was beautiful and we loved the outside shower and stunning plunge pool.  We ordered breakfast which was prepared by the staff in our room. We felt pampered and spoilt. Great location. Great shopping and the owner even let us have a late checkout. Can't fault this place. Would definitely recommend and would try to stay here again.
title: Amazing

text: Nous avons passé un superbe séjour à la villa Seriska. La villa est magnifique et très bien décorée (fleurs de frangipanier partout). L'accueil par Made était très chaleureux avec un très bon niveau de service. Le petit déjeuner très bien préparé est un plus. Le centre de Siminyak est très proche à pied.
title: Super séjour à la Villa seriska

text: 사진 그대로의 빌라. 방이 3개라 다수의 가족이 와도 괜찮은 공간. 풀은 크지는 않지만 생각보다 깊음. 성인 목까지 오는 정도. 관리인의 요리솜씨가 매우 좋음. 아침식사로 미고랭, 니시고랭 강추.
title: 매우 좋은 빌라와 요리솜씨가 좋은 관리인

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Vilket fantastiskt bemötande vi fick när vi kom till Villa Seriska på ön Bali i Seminyak. En villa på 200kvm med utomhus pool, villan var riktigt fin och och personalen var helt underbar. Vi bokade frukost och de kom till köket och lagade det man önskade av utbudet som fanns till den tiden som passade oss. Väldigt gott med juice, färsk frukt och bland annat ägg och bacon. Personalen är väldigt hjälpsamma och städar villan dagligen. Putra finns alltid tillgänglig och hjälper till att boka transport till och från flygplatsen eller till olika utflykter. Vi bokade också en välkomst massage som vi kan rekommendera efter många timmar på flyget. Poolen är helt fantastisk med egna solsängar. Vi kan verkligen rekommendera denna villa och vi kommer att komma tillbaka igen. Tack för att ni gjorde denna semester till en enastående upplevelse. 
You are the best, all the staff at Villa Seriska ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
title: Bästa Villa Seriska och Bali

owner_response.text:
Dear Fatima,

Thank you for your lovely comments about our villa and staff :) We are all so glad that you enjoyed staying at our villa and are already thinking about coming back! We look forward to welcoming you and your family/friends back to one of our villas in Bali.

The Villa Seriska Team
